verse.name: v1
verse.lines:
Fear not, for I am with you.
Fear not, for I am with you.
Fear not, for I am with you.
Saith the Lord.

verse.name: v2
verse.lines:
I have redeemed you.
I have called you by name.
Child you are mine.
When you walk through the water,
I will be there, and through the flame.
You'll not-no way-be burned,
You'll not-no way-be drowned.
For I am with you saith the Lord.
